text:
@narendramodi Honorable Modi Gi,
Yes, we follow your words to fight against COVID-19 menace. My request, as a biotechnologist we can to try for passive antibodies from infected people, colostrum, as the choice to immunize healthy people and the development of new synthetic antibodies.
